turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would like to order a caffè Americano from the Starbucks on 87th street in Chicago, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! on 160 W 87th St Bldg.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for your americano, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Tall, okay, any sugars or sweeteners?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Honey, and whip cream, noted. Anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, add a splash of whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a tall americano, with Honey a splash of whole milks and whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful! give me a moment to send it on over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
